resources.string: Weapon damaged, see Item Damage Chart
Dexterity save DC 10 or fall Prone
Dexterity save DC 15 or fall Prone
Fall Prone + Held item(s) scatter in random direction [1d8+2] feet
Weapon falls to ground within 5 feet of you
Held item is disarmed, it flies [1d8+2] feet in a random direction
Item flies out of your hand [2d8+4] feet in a random direction
Attacks against you have Advantage until the end of your next turn
Treat Normal Terrain as Difficult Terrain for [1d4] rounds
Heavily Encumbered for [1d4] rounds THEN Encumbered until Short Rest
Stunned until the end of your next turn
Attacks and Skill checks with affected hand have Disadvantage for [1d4] rounds
Arm becomes limp and unusable until treated, drop held item(s) + Treat attacks, saves and skills accordingly
Hit random ally within attack range for 1/2 Damage
Hit random ally within attack range for Normal Damage
Hit random ally within attack range for Critical Damage
Roll twice on this chart, if rolled again re-roll
Weapon damaged, see Item Damage Chart
Dexterity save DC 10 or fall Prone
Dexterity save DC 15 or fall Prone
Fall Prone + Held item(s) scatter in random direction [1d8+2] feet
Ammunition falls to ground within 5 feet of you
Weapon unusable until unjammed (1 action). No effect for thrown weapons.
Hit self for 1/2 Damage + Treat Normal Terrain as Difficult Terrain for [1d4] rounds
Weapon falls to ground within 5 feet of you
Your attacks have Disadvantage for [1d4] rounds
Treat Normal Terrain as Difficult Terrain for [1d4] rounds
Heavily Encumbered for [1d4] rounds THEN Encumbered until Short Rest
Blinded until end of next turn
Attacks and Skill checks with affected hand have Disadvantage for [1d4] rounds
Arm becomes limp and unusable until treated, drop held item(s) + Treat attacks, saves and skills accordingly
Hit random ally within attack range for 1/2 Damage
Hit random ally within attack range for Normal Damage
Hit random ally within attack range for Critical Damage
Roll twice on this chart, if rolled again re-roll
Focus damaged, see Item Damage Chart
Ground below your feet becomes slick in a 5 foot radius, Dexterity save DC 10 or fall Prone
Ground below your feet becomes slick in a 10 foot radius, Dexterity save DC 15 or fall Prone
You are thrown back 10 feet and fall Prone + Take [1d6] Bludgeoning Damage
Make Concentration checks at a Disadvantage + Immediate check for any ongoing Concentration
All Concentration checks Fail for [1d4] rounds + Immediately Fail any ongoing Concentration check
Unable to use Verbal (V) Components for [1d4] rounds + Unable to speak above a whisper
Your spell hits you for 1/2 Damage
Your spell hits you for Normal Damage
Your spell hits you for Critical Damage
Your components pouch spills onto the ground within 5 feet of you, unable to use Material (M) Components until gathered
A cloud of smoke envelops you creating a Heavily Obscured area with a radius of 5 feet, creatures inside are Blinded
Restrained until you break free, Strength check DC 10
The spells target becomes a horrific sight to you for [1d4] rounds + You are Frightened
Stunned until the end of your next turn + Deafened for [1d4] rounds
Heavily Encumbered for [1d4] rounds THEN Encumbered until Short Rest
Unable to use Somatic (S) Components for [1d4] rounds + Your attacks have Disadvantage
Hit random ally within attack range for 1/2 Damage
Hit random ally within attack range for Normal Damage
Hit random ally within attack range for Critical Damage
Roll twice on this chart, if rolled again re-roll
